sn12.4:1.2: “vipassissa, bhikkhave, bhagavato arahato sammasambuddhassa pubbeva sambodha anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato etadahosi:
sn12.4:1.3: ‘kiccham vatayam loko apanno jayati ca jiyati ca miyati ca cavati ca upapajjati ca.
sn12.4:1.4: Atha ca panimassa dukkhassa nissaranam nappajanati jaramaranassa.
sn12.4:1.5: Kudassu nama imassa dukkhassa nissaranam pannayissati jaramaranassa’ti?
sn12.4:2.1: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
sn12.4:2.2: ‘kimhi nu kho sati jaramaranam hoti, kimpaccaya jaramaranan’ti?
sn12.4:2.3: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikara ahu pannaya abhisamayo:
sn12.4:2.4: ‘jatiya kho sati jaramaranam hoti, jatipaccaya jaramaranan’ti.
sn12.4:3.1: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
sn12.4:3.2: ‘kimhi nu kho sati jati hoti, kimpaccaya jati’ti?
sn12.4:3.3: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikara ahu pannaya abhisamayo:
sn12.4:3.4: ‘bhave kho sati jati hoti, bhavapaccaya jati’ti.
sn12.4:4.1: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
sn12.4:4.2: ‘kimhi nu kho sati bhavo hoti, kimpaccaya bhavo’ti?
sn12.4:4.3: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikara ahu pannaya abhisamayo:
sn12.4:4.4: ‘upadane kho sati bhavo hoti, upadanapaccaya bhavo’ti.
sn12.4:5.1: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
sn12.4:5.2: ‘kimhi nu kho sati upadanam hoti, kimpaccaya upadanan’ti?
sn12.4:5.3: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikara ahu pannaya abhisamayo:
sn12.4:5.4: ‘tanhaya kho sati upadanam hoti, tanhapaccaya upadanan’ti.
sn12.4:6.1: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
sn12.4:6.2: ‘kimhi nu kho sati tanha hoti, kimpaccaya tanha’ti?
sn12.4:6.3: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikara ahu pannaya abhisamayo:
sn12.4:6.4: ‘vedanaya kho sati tanha hoti, vedanapaccaya tanha’ti.
sn12.4:7.1: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
sn12.4:7.2: ‘kimhi nu kho sati vedana hoti, kimpaccaya vedana’ti?
sn12.4:7.3: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikara ahu pannaya abhisamayo:
sn12.4:7.4: ‘phasse kho sati vedana hoti, phassapaccaya vedana’ti.
sn12.4:8.1: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
sn12.4:8.2: ‘kimhi nu kho sati phasso hoti, kimpaccaya phasso’ti?
sn12.4:8.3: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikara ahu pannaya abhisamayo:
sn12.4:8.4: ‘salayatane kho sati phasso hoti, salayatanapaccaya phasso’ti.
sn12.4:9.1: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
sn12.4:9.2: ‘kimhi nu kho sati salayatanam hoti, kimpaccaya salayatanan’ti?
sn12.4:9.3: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikara ahu pannaya abhisamayo:
sn12.4:9.4: ‘namarupe kho sati salayatanam hoti, namarupapaccaya salayatanan’ti.
sn12.4:10.1: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
sn12.4:10.2: ‘kimhi nu kho sati namarupam hoti, kimpaccaya namarupan’ti?
sn12.4:10.3: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikara ahu pannaya abhisamayo:
sn12.4:10.4: ‘vinnane kho sati namarupam hoti, vinnanapaccaya namarupan’ti.
sn12.4:11.1: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
sn12.4:11.2: ‘kimhi nu kho sati vinnanam hoti, kimpaccaya vinnanan’ti?
sn12.4:11.3: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikara ahu pannaya abhisamayo:
sn12.4:11.4: ‘sankharesu kho sati vinnanam hoti, sankharapaccaya vinnanan’ti.
sn12.4:12.1: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
sn12.4:12.2: ‘kimhi nu kho sati sankhara honti, kimpaccaya sankhara’ti?
sn12.4:12.3: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikara ahu pannaya abhisamayo:
sn12.4:12.4: ‘avijjaya kho sati sankhara honti, avijjapaccaya sankhara’ti.
sn12.4:13.4: ‘Samudayo, samudayo’ti kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapadi, nanam udapadi, panna udapadi, vijja udapadi, aloko udapadi.
sn12.4:14.1: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
sn12.4:14.2: ‘kimhi nu kho asati jaramaranam na hoti, kissa nirodha jaramarananirodho’ti?
sn12.4:14.3: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikara ahu pannaya abhisamayo:
sn12.4:14.4: ‘jatiya kho asati jaramaranam na hoti, jatinirodha jaramarananirodho’ti.
sn12.4:15.1: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
sn12.4:15.2: ‘kimhi nu kho asati jati na hoti, kissa nirodha jatinirodho’ti?
sn12.4:15.3: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikara ahu pannaya abhisamayo:
sn12.4:15.4: ‘bhave kho asati jati na hoti, bhavanirodha jatinirodho’ti.
sn12.4:16.1: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
sn12.4:16.2: ‘kimhi nu kho asati bhavo na hoti, kissa nirodha bhavanirodho’ti?
sn12.4:16.3: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikara ahu pannaya abhisamayo:
sn12.4:16.4: ‘upadane kho asati bhavo na hoti, upadananirodha bhavanirodho’ti.
sn12.4:17.1: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
sn12.4:17.2: ‘kimhi nu kho asati upadanam na hoti, kissa nirodha upadananirodho’ti?
sn12.4:17.3: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikara ahu pannaya abhisamayo:
sn12.4:17.4: ‘tanhaya kho asati upadanam na hoti, tanhanirodha upadananirodho’ti.
sn12.4:18.1: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
sn12.4:18.2: ‘kimhi nu kho asati tanha na hoti, kissa nirodha tanhanirodho’ti?
sn12.4:18.3: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikara ahu pannaya abhisamayo:
sn12.4:18.4: ‘vedanaya kho asati tanha na hoti, vedananirodha tanhanirodho’ti.
sn12.4:19.1: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
sn12.4:19.2: ‘kimhi nu kho asati vedana na hoti, kissa nirodha vedananirodho’ti?
sn12.4:19.3: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikara ahu pannaya abhisamayo:
sn12.4:19.4: ‘phasse kho asati vedana na hoti, phassanirodha vedananirodho’ti.
sn12.4:20.1: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
sn12.4:20.2: ‘kimhi nu kho asati phasso na hoti, kissa nirodha phassanirodho’ti?
sn12.4:20.3: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikara ahu pannaya abhisamayo:
sn12.4:20.4: ‘salayatane kho asati phasso na hoti, salayatananirodha phassanirodho’ti.
sn12.4:21.1: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
sn12.4:21.2: ‘kimhi nu kho asati salayatanam na hoti, kissa nirodha salayatananirodho’ti?
sn12.4:21.3: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikara ahu pannaya abhisamayo:
sn12.4:21.4: ‘namarupe kho asati salayatanam na hoti, namarupanirodha salayatananirodho’ti.
sn12.4:22.1: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
sn12.4:22.2: ‘kimhi nu kho asati namarupam na hoti, kissa nirodha namarupanirodho’ti?
sn12.4:22.3: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikara ahu pannaya abhisamayo:
sn12.4:22.4: ‘vinnane kho asati namarupam na hoti, vinnananirodha namarupanirodho’ti.
sn12.4:23.1: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
sn12.4:23.2: ‘kimhi nu kho asati vinnanam na hoti, kissa nirodha vinnananirodho’ti?
sn12.4:23.3: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikara ahu pannaya abhisamayo:
sn12.4:23.4: ‘sankharesu kho asati vinnanam na hoti, sankharanirodha vinnananirodho’ti.
sn12.4:24.1: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
sn12.4:24.2: ‘kimhi nu kho asati sankhara na honti, kissa nirodha sankharanirodho’ti?
sn12.4:24.3: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikara ahu pannaya abhisamayo:
sn12.4:24.4: ‘avijjaya kho asati sankhara na honti, avijjanirodha sankharanirodho’ti.
sn12.4:25.4: ‘Nirodho, nirodho’ti kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapadi, nanam udapadi, panna udapadi, vijja udapadi, aloko udapadi”ti.
